name: Untitled Cat Game (codo)
description:
Play as a cat as you navigate a heavily guarded museum full of priceless art. Destroy everything you can without going noticed!      

Break all the things to gain access to the coveted "Winner's Room" in the back of the museum. Good luck and thanks for playing!

Controls:

movement - arrows or wasd

jump - space bar

push - E


Made w/ love for Pigsquad's Summer Slow Jams

by: Cody, Nick & Al

Tips & Tricks:

- press SPACE again mid-air while touching a platform to get a double jump

- you can jump once anytime while falling, try delaying your jump to get to hard to reach places

- guards can only see directly in front of them, and won't notice you at all if you're entirely behind an object
